GetControl.name: GetControl
GetControl.description: Grants permission to return details about a specific control

ListCommonControls.name: ListCommonControls
ListCommonControls.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of common controls from the AWS Control Catalog

ListControls.name: ListControls
ListControls.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all available controls in the AWS Control Catalog library

ListDomains.name: ListDomains
ListDomains.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of domains from the AWS Control Catalog

ListObjectives.name: ListObjectives
ListObjectives.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of objectives from the AWS Control Catalog
